text.mandateNotification: I hereby grant the mandate for the SEPA direct debit (electronic transmission) and confirm that the given bank details are correct!
text.aboutMandate:
I authorise (A) Novalnet AG to send instructions to my bank to debit my account and (B) my bank to debit my account in accordance with the instructions from Novalnet AG.

Creditor identifier: DE53ZZZ00000004253

Note:You are entitled to a refund from your bank under the terms and conditions of your agreement with bank. A refund must be claimed within 8 weeks starting from the date on which your account was debited.
text.confirmMessage: The transaction has been confirmed on %s
text.creditMessage: Credit has been successfully received for the TID: %1$s with amount %2$s on %3$s. Please refer PAID order details in our Novalnet Admin Portal for the TID: %4$s
text.faliureMessage: The transaction has been canceled on %s
text.amountUpdateComment: Transaction amount %s has been updated successfully on %s
text.updateOnholdComments: The transaction status has been changed from pending to on-hold for the TID: %s on %s
text.updateComments1: Transaction updated successfully for the TID: %s with the amount %s on %s
text.amountTransferWithDueDate: Please transfer the amount of %1$s to the following account on or before %2$s
text.chargebackComments: Chargeback executed successfully for the TID: %s amount: %s on %s. The subsequent TID: %s
text.updateConfirmComments: Transaction updated successfully for the TID: %s with amount %s on %s.
text.cashDueDateComments: The transaction has been updated with amount %s and slip expiry date %s.
text.dueDateComments: The transaction has been updated with amount %s and due date %s.
text.refundAlreadyExists: Refund has been already initiated for the order
text.amountTransaferNoteWithDueDate: Please transfer the amount of %s to the following account on or before %s
text.amountTransaferNote: Please transfer the amount of %s to the following account.
text.removeConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to remove these payment method?
text.paymentReferenceNote: Please use any of the following payment references when transferring the amount. This is necessary to match it with your corresponding order
text.paymentError: Payment was not successful. An error occurred
text.dobInvalid: You need to be at least 18 years old
text.dobEmpty: Please enter your date of birth
text.refundComment: Refund has been initiated for the TID: %s with the amount of %s.
text.refundCommentForNewTid: New TID:%s for the refunded amount
text.multibancoReference:
Please use the following payment reference details to pay the amount of %s at a Multibanco ATM or through
your internet banking : %s
text.invoiceGuaranteePendingMsg: Your order is being verified. Once confirmed, we will send you our bank details to which the order amount should be transferred. Please note that this may take up to 24 hours
text.sepaGuaranteePendingMsg: Your order is under verification and we will soon update you with the order status. Please note that this may take upto 24 hours.
